meanings.sent1: In our small town, the mayor holds great eminences.
meanings.sent2: The professor's eminences in the academic world are well-known.
meanings.sent3: The cat claimed the eminences of the highest spot on the bookshelf.
meanings.sent4: Her eminences in the business world opened many doors for her.
meanings.sent5: The eminences of the mountain peak were visible from miles away.

meanings.definition: A high place or part; a hill or elevation
meanings.sent1: The castle was built on the eminences overlooking the valley.
meanings.sent2: We hiked to the eminences to get a better view of the sunset.
meanings.sent3: The eminences of the playground were perfect for hide-and-seek.
meanings.sent4: The eminences of the hill were covered in wildflowers.
meanings.sent5: From the eminences, you could see the entire city below.

meanings.definition: A projection or protuberance on a surface
meanings.sent1: The artist added small eminences to the sculpture for texture.
meanings.sent2: The map showed the eminences of the terrain in great detail.
meanings.sent3: The eminences on the cake made it look like a miniature mountain range.
meanings.sent4: The eminences on the tree bark provided hiding spots for insects.
meanings.sent5: The eminences on the rock face made it challenging to climb.
